name: Reingar's Special Drink
loreDescription: A drink specially made in Reingar. With its pretty color and sweet scent, this drink is great for relaxation. They say this drink also enhances concentration, memorization, and judgment, but this hasn't been verified yet.

skillDescription.base: When attacking all enemies, has a 50% chance to inflict additional damage. Additional damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Attack.
skillDescription.max: When attacking all enemies, has a 100% chance to inflict additional damage. Additional damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Attack.
